GSD.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v5.10.129
GSD.description:
linux/dim: Fix divide by 0 in RDMA DIM

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.129 by commit fae2a9fb1eaf348ad8732f90d42ebbb971bd7e95, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit f4915455dcf07c4f237d6160a4b6adb0575d2909. For more details please see the references link.
